quotes.quote: Authenticity requires a certain measure of vulnerability, transparency, and integrity.
We have to dare to be ourselves, however frightening or strange that self may prove to be.
You can't try to be authentic. You either are or you aren't.
The struggle to excavate your true, authentic self from beneath the mountain of conditioning and ridiculous expectation is the epic struggle of your lifetime.
Hard times arouse an instinctive desire for authenticity.
Don't explain your philosophy. Embody it.
Your visions will become clear only when you can look into your own heart. Who looks outside, dreams; who looks inside, awakes.
The most authentic thing about us is our capacity to create, to overcome, to endure, to transform, to love and to be greater than our suffering.
When you are authentic, you create a certain energy, people want to be around you because you are unique.
This above all; to thine own self be true.
Be sure that you put your feet at the right place, then stand firm.
Authenticity is more than speaking; Authenticity is also about doing. Every decision we make says something about who we are.
The authentic self is soul made visible.
Be yourself. The world worships an original.
That inner voice has both gentleness and clarity. So to get to authenticity, you really keep going down to the bone, to the honesty, and the inevitability of something.
The most important thing is what you already do. It's being authentic. It's being curious, trying to discover gifts.
Authenticity is at the heart of success.
Authenticity is about being true to who you are.
Don't compromise yourself. You are all you've got.
Do what you can, with what you have, where you are.
We are all different. Don't judge, understand instead.
Authentic power is the real deal. You can't inherit it, buy it, or win it. You also can't lose it. You don't need to build your body, reputation, wealth, or charisma to get it.
Authenticity is the alignment of head, mouth, heart, and feet â€“ thinking, saying, feeling, and doing the same thing â€“ consistently. This builds trust, and followers love leaders they can trust.
Everything we see is but a mirror of what we are.
Be who you are and say what you feel, because those who mind don't matter and those who matter don't mind.
Just be your authentic self because there's nothing sexier or more beautiful than that.
To be nobody but yourself in a world which is doing its best, night and day, to make you everybody else means to fight the hardest battle which any human being can fight; and never stop fighting.
Being your authentic self is the ultimate secret to happiness in life!
Don't be afraid of being unique. It's like being afraid of your best self.
